function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased marketing expenditures in banking and food service industries","Impact":"Potential increase in physical interaction and exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing contactless delivery, online transactions, and strict hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online ordering platforms, UV sterilization technology","People":"Consumers, employees, delivery personnel","Owner":"Business owners, marketing teams"},{"Description":"Lack of accurate pandemic predictions and forecasts","Impact":"Uncertainty in the duration of the pandemic and its impact on the economy","Mitigation":"Investing in diversified business strategies, scenario planning, and crisis management frameworks","Technologies":"Predictive modeling, data analytics, scenario analysis tools","People":"Economists, business leaders, government officials","Owner":"Business leaders, strategic planning teams"},{"Description":"Lack of trust and reassurance among consumers","Impact":"Decreased consumer confidence and loyalty, potential decline in sales","Mitigation":"Transparent communication, reassurance of safety measures, and support for the community","Technologies":"Social media engagement, targeted messaging, virtual customer support","People":"Consumers, business stakeholders, employees","Owner":"Brand managers, customer service teams"}]}
